titleStmt.title: A myrroure or lokynge glasse wherin you may beholde the sacramente of baptisme described Anno. M.D.xxxiii. Per me I.F.
titleStmt.author: Frith, John, 1503-1533.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Ihon Daye, dwellynge in Sepulchres parishe, at the signe of the Resurrection, a litle aboue Holburne condite,

notesStmt.note: Imprint from colophon; publication date conjectured by STC.
Running title reads: of Baptisme. A declaration.
Reproduction of the original in the Cambridge University Library.

place.placeName: Sepulchres parishe, at the signe of the Resurrection, a litle aboue Holburne condite
